price: (46) And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
